title: Car review: Facelifted Renault Megane RS is top dog in hot hatch segment
title_page: Car review: Facelifted Renault Megane RS is top dog in hot hatch segment | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - As I drive out of the Renault showroom in Leng Kee Road in the latest Megane RS, I feel like a top dog.
With 296hp on tap, the hot hatch is the quickest and most expensive Renault car on sale. I can pull up next to any Renault on the road with a grin.
